raw_text: Rev. Sister GERALDINE PERERA,​ Sister of Charity of Jesus and Mary is called to the Lord. Her remains lie at Sacred Heart Convent,​ Galle. Funeral Mass will be at 10 a.m. on Wednesday,​ the 27th September 2023 followed by Burial at Dadalla Cemetery,​ Galle. Please be united in Prayer. Informed by : the Provincial Superior of Sisters of Charity of Jesus and Mary. Rev. Sr. Patsy Pitchai.061068

GOONEWARDENE – AVIS NINETTE (nee GERREYN) – Safe in the Arms of our Dear Lord on 21st September 2023 at Castle Hill NSW,​ Australia. Beloved wife of the late Douglas,​ loving mother of Daphne,​ Christopher and Romayne (Dec.),​ mother-in-law of Frank Soertsz,​ loving sister of Daisybelle Othen,​ Kingsley (Sonny),​ Dolores Wait,​ Alistair (Pinky,​ (All dec) and Pamela Blake (Canada),​ Desmond (Sydney) & Russell (Perth),​ loving grandmother to Natalie,​ Michael,​ Karina,​ Gareth,​ Damon & Jordan & to her great grandchildren. A Funeral Service will be held at the Wesley Uniting Church,​ Showground Road,​ Castle Hill,​ NSW on Friday,​ 29th September,​ 2023 at 10.00 a.m. followed by a private cremation. In lieu of flowers,​ a donation to The Cheshire Home,​ 17,​ Siripala Road,​ Mt. Lavinia,​ would be appreciated.061011

NETHTHIKUMARA RANJITH SRILAL FONSEKA – Beloved husband of Srimathie (ex UNESCO France),​ much loved father of late Srinath,​ Srinath,​ Srimalie,​ late Srimal and Srilal Junior,​ much loved father-in-law of Gregory Caron and Sam Fernandoz (Australia),​ beloved grandfather of Catherine,​ Charlize and Augustine,​ passed away peacefully in Sri Lanka. Remains lie at “The Respect” Jayarathne Parlour Bauddhaloka Mawatha from 10 a.m. on 26th September and Cremation 5 p.m. at General Cemetery Kanaththa,​ Borella on 27th Setember. 0777683672.061066
